item.title: Why am I interested in Python?
item.description: The interesting part of Python is that this software can be used on multiple platforms, such as RStudio. This makes it more convenient and easier to use as well. Python is a very functional and easy language to use once you get familar to the software. Many companies use this versatile language since it is so well-structured. Python is a high level programming language

item.title: Project 2
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:
